who.title: Who makes it happen
text: The Palma Produções operates in **impactful projects** in the cultural and socio-environmental areas, with a focus on **narrative solutions** that value the **memory and cultural diversity of Brazil.**

**Investigating, connecting, cultivating, celebrating, projecting, and telling stories** that promote a sense of belonging to our **Brazilian identity** and  <mark>generate **positive impact** in the world</mark>. This is what motivates us to work in creative, strategic, and collaborative processes **<mark>- in the audiovisual universe and multi-platform actions -</mark> to shed light on the protagonism of those who make history happen**.
